description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Do you like the feeling of being warm by the fire while a snow storm blows outside your window?  Snow Day recreates that feeling by simulating a snow storm on your TV.  Play your own music on top, and Snow Day becomes the perfect mood-toy for the holidays.
description.short: Do you like the feeling of being warm by the fire while a snow storm blows outside your window?  Snow Day recreates that feeling by simulating a snow storm on your TV.  Play your own music on top, and Snow Day becomes the perfect mood-toy for the holidays.
